poem:
Title: "The Echo of a Verdict"

A strike of gavel's searing speech,
Beneath the justice's sombre reach,
By silicon sparks and journalism's might,
A verdict cast in harsh daylight.

With narratives twisted, chances slim,
Across the hours, shadows dim,
In America's mirror, past the glean,
OJ's face, forever seen.

On society's canvas, hues bled, awry,
A picture drawn of a divided sky.
